DataElement.preferredName: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale Completion Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of completion of the Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CESD), a short, self-reporting scale intended for the general population.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to the Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CESD), a short, self-reporting scale intended for the general population.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: MSH2005_2004_10_12:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: Depression; a mental state of depressed mood characterised by feelings of sadness, despair and discouragement. (On-line Medical Dictionary):an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: A melancholy feeling of sadness and despair.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Released status approved by CCR on 2/5/2005.
